item.title: jennifer add a quote by gide
jennifer add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "Imperfection is beauty, madness is genius and it's better to be absolutely ridiculous than absolutely boring." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: jennifer add a quote by George Bernard Shaw
item.description: "The only man I know who behaves sensibly is my tailor; he takes my measurements anew each time he sees me. The rest go on with their old measurements and expect me to fit them." -- George Bernard Shaw

item.title: jennifer add a quote by J.D. Salinger
item.description: "I’m just sick of ego, ego, ego. My own and everybody else’s. I’m sick of everybody that wants to get somewhere, do something distinguished and all, be somebody interesting. It’s disgusting." -- J.D. Salinger

item.title: jennifer add a quote by Angela Carter
item.description: "I will tell you what Jeanne was like. She was like a piano in a country where everyone has had their hands cut off." -- Angela Carter

item.title: jennifer add a quote by J.D. Salinger
item.description: "I'm sick of just liking people. I wish to God I could meet somebody I could respect." -- J.D. Salinger

item.title: jennifer add a quote by Marge Piercy
item.description: "Attention is love, what we must give children, mothers, fathers, pets, our friends, the news, the woes of others. What we want to change we curse and then pick up a tool. Bless whatever you can with eyes and hands and tongue. If you can't bless it, get ready to make it new." -- Marge Piercy

item.title: jennifer add a quote by E.B. White
item.description: "If the world were merely seductive, that would be easy. If it were merely challenging, that would be no problem. But I arise in the morning torn between a desire to improve the world and a desire to enjoy the world. This makes it hard to plan the day." -- E.B. White

item.title: jennifer add a quote by Jonas Mekas
item.description: "In the very end, civilizations perish because they listen to their politicians and not to their poets." -- Jonas Mekas

item.title: jennifer add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: jennifer add a quote by Don DeLillo
item.description: "California deserves whatever it gets. Californians invented the concept of life-style. This alone warrants their doom." -- Don DeLillo

item.title: jennifer add a quote by Ginnetta Correli
item.description: "Always suffer delusions of grandeur with your art. What you are unable to face will never hurt you" -- Ginnetta Correli

item.title: jennifer add a quote by Henry Miller
item.description: "Everyone has his own reality in which, if one is not too cautious, timid or frightened, one swims. This is the only reality there is." -- Henry Miller

item.title: jennifer add a quote by Wil Wheaton
item.description:
"Things every person should have:
•A nemesis. •An evil twin. •A secret headquarters. •An escape hatch. •A partner in crime. •A secret identity." -- Wil Wheaton

item.title: jennifer add a quote by Isabelle Eberhardt
item.description: "Now more than ever do I realize that I will never be content with a sedentary life, that I will always be haunted by thoughts of a sun-drenched elsewhere." -- Isabelle Eberhardt

item.title: jennifer add a quote by Isabelle Eberhardt
item.description: "For those who know the value of and exquisite taste of solitary freedom (for one is only free when alone), the act of leaving is the bravest and most beautiful of all." -- Isabelle Eberhardt
